programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o date.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> instr 1 ii,ij date print ii print ij Sa dates ii prints Sa Ss dates -1 prints Ss St dates 1 prints St endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i 1 0 1 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
